290b4: mchog yongs su bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i gnas pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mngon
290b5: par shes pa thams cad la brtson 'grus bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grus
290b6: brtsom pa dang / bdud thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / stobs brtan pa chen pos pha rol gnon pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / pha rol rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pa
290b7: tshar bcad pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshes yongs su bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi phyir
290b8: brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bya ba thams cad nyams 'og du chud par byed cing brtson pa mi gtong ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems zhum pa med par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / nyon
291a1: mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'i phyir son chus solag ma sprul ba bsgral/ ma grol ba grol/ dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las
291a2: bzla ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir brtson
291a3: 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing sangs rgyas la blta ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems dang lus dben pa'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de dben pa las
291a4: nges par byung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus blang ba med cing dor ba med la/ gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med de/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pas bsdus pa
291a5: yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum
291a6: bcu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ / sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa yongs su dag pa dang / blo gros yongs su dag pa dang /
291a7: rtogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / khrel yod pa yongs su dag pa dang / mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / bsngo ba yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa yongs su
291a8: dag pa dang / dbang po sbas pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi gnas pa yongs su dag pa dang / de la ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bskyed pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems las su rung ba yongs
291b1: su dag pa dang / lus dben pa yongs su dag pa dang / brag cha shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / nad nye bar zhi ba yongs su dag pa dang / phyi rol du mi rgyu ba yongs su dag pa dang dmigs pa'i lta ba spyod pa yongs su
291b2: dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med par so sor rtog cing khams gsum pa la mi gnas pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgo
291b3: yongs su dag pa dang / sems can la lta ba'i snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab la 'jug pas rab rib med cing snang ba yongs su dag pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa dang mi 'gal ba
291b4: yongs su dag pa dang / chos la sems dpa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi rnam pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa yongs su dag pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa bsdu ba yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi
291b5: snying po bsgrub pa yong su dag pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang mi 'dre ba yongs su dag pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan pasgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa la mi g.yeng ba
291b6: yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la lta ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes nas so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa
291b7: yongs su dag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// mi'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu
291b8: gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ / sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pas mang du thos pa dang / tshul bzhin yid
292a1: la byed pas chos rnams la dpyod pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub mngon sum du byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi chos bsgrub pa shes pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa la 'jug pas rnam par grol ba shes pa dang
292a2: chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba khong du chud pas stong pa'i rnam par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang /
292a3: der mi ltung bar skyon med pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bsams bzhin du skye bas skye ba la so sor mi rtog pa'i shes pa dang / bzod ma nas rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi skye bar shes pa dang / phyin ci log tu gyur pa
292a4: yongs su smin par byed pas sems can thams cad bdag med par shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i phyir chos thams cad chos gcig tu shes pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir zhing thams cad
292a5: zhing gcig tu shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pas sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu shes pa dang / yi ge shes pa la mkhas pas chos kyi tshig rab tu 'bye ba bstan pa shes pa
292a6: dang / legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i spobs pas chos rgya cher shes pa dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzin pas gzungs brjed pa med pa'i shes pa dang / bdud de/
292a7: dag byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pas// bdud kyi las thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs te so sor nye bar gnas par shes pas chos thams cad susgyu ma lta bur rtog pa'i shes pa dang /
292a8: shin du yongs su grub pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad rmi la ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / brag cha lta bu'i tshul du ston pa shes pa dang / shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi sa
292b1: kyi spyod pa thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang / shin du bslabs pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa tags par shes pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i phyir stong pa nyid dang /
292b2: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa'i chos shes pa dang / bzod ma nas brel ba med pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar shes pa dang / ma rig pa dang / gti mug
292b3: gi mun pa kun tu bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la rab rib med cing snang ba thob pa dang / chos thams cad gar yang mi 'gro gang nas kyang mi 'ong bar shes pas shes rab kyi 'od dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad
292b4: la rnam par thar pa'i chos ston pa dang / las dang bya ba khong du chud pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang 'gro bar skye ba ston pa dang / don dang / chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa'i tshul la mkhas te phyed par de kho
292b5: na'i lus ston pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / bdag dul ba dang zhi ba dang / grol ba dang / sbas pa dang / byang bas yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i phyir don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / dam pa'i chos yodra
292b6: su 'dzin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de shes rab las nges par byung bar rig nas chos kyi grong khyer thams cad yongs su sbyong par byin gyis rlob pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
292b7: sal yang dag par gzhol te/ mtha' laganas pa'i tshul nges par byas pas lung bstan pa'i sa rab tu thob pa yin te/ mi'amaci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'
292b8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dka ba yin no/ / mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/
293a1: 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' bdag zad par mi byed pas sems can la blta ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams chen po la gnas pa dang / sems can
293a2: thams cad kyi sbyin gnas kyi phyir sbyin gnas mi tshol ba dang / sems can dbul po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rgya chen po don du mi gnyer ba dang / sems can thams cad ngag bsdam pa la sbyar ba'i phyir//
293a3: thug pa dang // dag pa lta bur ston pa dang / bud med dang bra mo yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bud med yongs su 'dzin pa dang / khye'u yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ khye'u'i gzugs su ston pa dang / sems
293a4: can yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/ gzugs thams cod ston pa dang / sems can myos pa yod su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ myos pa ma yin yang myos pa'i lus su ston pa dang / de la myos pa'i sems
293a5: can rnams la chos ston pa'i phyir/ smon pa dang / sems g.yeng ba'i gzugs su ston pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ lo brgyar bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po 'dor ba dang / chos
293a6: 'dzin du bzhug pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la dga' ba thams cad la rtse ba dang / longs spyod ston pa dang / de la mos pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ g.yon can ma rungs pas 'tsha ba'i
293a7: lus su ston pa dang / bud med gang tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po'i chung mar gyur pa/ bu med pa bu'i tshe 'dod pa'i mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshe rab myong ba la de na byang chub sems
293a8: dpas de dag dge ba la dad cing yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de'i bur khas len pa dang / 'brog dgon par song ba'i sems can dbul po la bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / nor sbyin zhing bgo bsha' bya ba'i phyir
293b1: 'dron pa mang po'i nang du ded dpon du 'gyur ba dang / gter chen po bdun du byas nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas chos ston pa dang / mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi mya ngan gyi zug rngu bsal nas
293b2: rdzu 'phrul gyi chos ston pa dang / gter stor ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'dun du gter chen po nye bar bstan nas/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dgug pa'i
293b3: phyir/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun du rgyu ba rnams kyi nang du rab tu 'byung ba dang / sems can 'dod chags kyi lcags kyus zin pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smad 'tshong ba'i khyim dang /
293b4: slas kyi nang du mo'i gzugs mdzes pa blta na sdug par ston pa dang / sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa chen po dang / tshegs pa mang po'i nang du rngad
293b5: rnga mri dang ga dang rnga phan pa dang dung gi sgras sa chen po mdzes par byas nas/ bdag nye bar ston cing sems can 'dus pa de dag la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra de dag las chos ston pa'i sgra 'byin cing bzo'i las kyi gnas
293b6: thams cad nye bar ston pa dang / mya ngan du son pa'i 'dron pa bza' ba dang / btung ba zad pa la mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par brtse zhing / de'i stobs kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba byin nas bkres pa dang bral zhing
293b7: sgom pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can gang dag dmus long du gyur pa de dag gi nang du dmus long lta bur gyur nas/ dbul po mig med pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
293b8: bza' ba dang / btung ba 'byor par byas nas/ mig byin te rang gi gzugs bstan nas/ ji ltar de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston pa dang / rgyal po'i
294a1: khri mon du bcug pa'i srog chags brgya phrag du ma g.yon sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du bdag rkun por ston cing de g.yon can no zhes shes
294a2: par byas nas/ khri mon du bcug pa dang de der zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcings pa/ de dag gi lus bkrus shing bskus te/ gos bzang po bskon nas bza' ba dang / btung bas lus tshim par byas te/
294a3: bcings pa dam po de dag las bkrol nas ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa dang / sems can gang dag rgyal pos bsad par sgri ba srog 'chi ba'i 'jim
294a4: pa thob pa/ sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis gzhan dag cig sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis gsher ma la spri nas
294a5: bsad par 'os pa'i mi de dag bcings pa de las bkrol te/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba srog rnyed pa dang / dbugs phyin pa de dag la ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta
294a6: de lta bur chos ston pa dang / phyogs gang na don dang / nor dang / zhing dang / khyim gyi dngos po dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / dmag mi'i phyir 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'tshang 'brub
294a7: gyur pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs kyis dbus su 'dug nas rdzu 'phrul gyis don dang / nor dang rin po che yongs su btang ste/ de dag 'dun par sbyor ro// de dag dum par rig nas bla
294a8: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyis dbang po nyams pa med kyang sems
294b1: can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dbang po nyams par yang ston pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad 'khrugs par yang byed pa dang / byang
294b2: chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas gzhan mu stegs can ston pa dang / ring du gnas pa bdud kyi spyod yul la spyad pa bdud kyis byin gyis bzlas pa mu stegs can de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dgug pa'i
294b3: phyir de dag gi mdun du dkon mchog gsum gyi sngags pa brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
294b4: ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas bsams bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa rnams la skye ba'i sdug bsngal bstan nas/ dben pa thob pa nam
294b5: bla ma'i lam bsgom du gzung ba'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa dang / skyon med pa la ma zhugs pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'dun pa rnams kyi mdun du/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas
294b6: pa sangs rgyas kyi sku ston pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa thob cing / sems mnyam par gzhag pa nams byang chub kyi sems len du gzung ba'i phyir/ rkyen 'di shes pa la 'jug pa nye bar ston pa ste/ mi 'am
294b7: ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ / pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dag
294b8: pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i 'khor dang de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i srog chags dgu khri brgyad stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
295a1: du sems skyes so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' las byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdang ba
295a2: ni shes rab skyon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur to/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis rab tu dga' bar byas yang dag par 'dzin du btsud yang dag par
295a3: bzengs bstod/ yang dag par bstan pas/ tshim zhing mgul yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde bskyes nas/ ran thar med pa'i ras bcos ma thugs gcig bcom ldan 'das la mang
295a4: par bkab bo/ / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la yang rin thad med pa'i gos kyis so sor bkab bo// gnas thams cad ni yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir bcom ldan
295a5: 'das la phul lo/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu brgyad stong pos rin po che'i pad ma bkod pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs brgyad stong du tshang bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ gtor ma
295a6: thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar sna nga la dpag tshad stong tsam na/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig tu gnas par gyur to// de
295a7: nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal ba ste pa'i bu brgyad stong pos bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgul med rangs gling rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ lhag pa'i bsam
295a8: than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dig da ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das gar thos pas bdag cag byang chu
295b1: kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag gas bshad du gsol/ / de
295b2: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs nas/ sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od thung ste/
295b3: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// gang mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phyed de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gi rol mo sil snyan rnam pa sna
295b4: tshogs de dag thams cad ma brdungs ma dkrol bar mdzes pa dang ldan par 'khrol lo/ / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi dad ldan na dri'i shing dang me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed pa de dag las kyang rol mo sil snyan gyi
295b5: sgra blung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stod byung ngo // 'od zer thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang padam tshang shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag byung ngo // pad ma'i snying po
295b6: thams cad la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun du brgyan pa'i lus ngag gnas par kun du snang ngo / / sang ma rgyas kyi mthus rol mo sil snyan de dag las ni
295b7: yongs su 'dri ba'i tshigs su bcad pa byungad/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni sgra dbyangs dang skad cig gis tshigs su bcad nas nges par lan 'debs so// de la sil snyan las tshigs su bcad pa/ thAn
295b8: med pa'i byang chub sems/ / ji lta bur ni bskyed pa dang // byang chub snying por 'dug par du// sems ni brjed pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// sems can kun gyi tshad kyi phyir
296a1: lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs/ / snying rje tshe dang ldan pa ni// byang chub sems brjed mi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag bsam pa ji lta bu// rab tu 'byor pa'ang ci 'dra zhig/ de
296a2: dag snying rje chen po la/ / nges par sems dpa' ji ltar skye// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa ste// de dag sbyor ba bcos pa min// mya ngan 'da' sgor 'jog
296a3: pa ni/ / de dag snying rje de 'dra'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gtong ba ji lta bu// ji ltar byin nas 'gyod med cing // rnam smin don du mi gnyer bar// byang chub tu ni bsngo bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'i
296a4: gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dngos po kun la mi lta ba// des ni byin nas 'gyod pa med// byang chub lam du 'jog byed pa// de phyir rnam smin re ba med// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar tshul khrims ldan
296a5: g+har kyang / / tshul khrims kyis ni rlom sems med// theg chen bla na med pa la// ngang tshul ngan can smin par byin// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// byang chub sems kyi tshul khrims ldan//
296a6: pa nyid kyis rlom sems med// byams pa chen po bskyed pa ni// ngang tshul ngan can yongs smin byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar na ni sems can gyis// spyos shing bsdigs pa bzod byed cing // sems
296a7: kyis gnod pa mi byed la/ / mchog tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi// nyon mongs gso ba'i sman pa snyam// de dag ngan par
296a8: smras pa yi/ / tshig thos zhe sdang mi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag brtson 'grus ji lta bu// pha rol gnon pa'ang ci 'dra zhig/ ji ltar zhum pa med sems kyis// byang chub spyad pa spyod par
296b1: 'gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ chos dang sems can bsrung ba ni// pha rol gnon dang brtson 'grus so// dge ba'i rtsa bas bstan pa ni// des na sems ni zhum mi 'gyur// sil
296b2: snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag ji ltar dran dang ldan// blo gros rtogs par khong du chud// ji ltar bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de la chags pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyi
296b3: smras pa/ g.yeng ba med pa dran dang ldan// tshul 'chos med pa blo gros ldan// thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// des na de la chags mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar shes rab ldan
296b4: pa dang / / yang dag lta ba drang po dang // chos rnams rnam par dbye ba la// mkhas shing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// thos pas shes rab kun du 'phel// rten
296b5: pas lta ba drang por 'gyur/ / chos kyi sbyin pas nges 'gyur te// tshul bzhin gyis ni don rtogs 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar thob pa btsal bas na// de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur// gang gis cha
296b6: ba'i bdag 'gyur bar/ / thos pa'i chos rnams ston par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis spras pa// gus par byas te thos tshol zhing // bsgrub pas thos pa mang du 'gyur/ zang zing med/
296b7: chos sbyin pa// des ni che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag byams pa ji lta bu// / de dag snying rje ci 'dra zhig/ de dag dga' ba ji lta bu// btang snyoms kyang na
296b8: ci 'dra zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// sems dang bsam snyoms byams pa zhig/ sems can 'grol ba snying rje'o// sangs rgyas chos dga' dga' ba ste// gnyis spangs pa ni
297a1: kA ga / / dbas kyis/ g+sa su sa rgyu chung/ / / na sa du/ zung/ ma ma gyur/
297a2: chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran skams pa// des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur// the tsom med cing bas ma dag pas// chas thos nas na som nyi med// sa la snyan rnams
297a3: kyis smras pa/ bsod nams tshogs na dzaM lta bya// ye shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra zhig/ de dag zhi gnas lhag mthong la// brtson pa yang ni ji lta bya// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ rnams
297a4: shes pa bsod nams tshags/ / 'dri ba rnams ni ye shes tshegs// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi gnas te// chos shes pa ni lhag mthong ngo // sil spyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gis ni spyod yul ga pa// de dag gan
297a5: kyang ji lta bu/ / de dag gnas pa ci 'dra zhig/ de dag sbyor ba'ang ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag spyod yul stong pa nyid// gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam// gnas pa
297a6: bsam gtan bzhi rnams te/ / sems can rab 'grol stor ba'o// sal snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag bdud kyi las gang yin// sangs rgyas 'phrin las ji lta bu// ci 'dra ba yi las byas na// byang chub
297a7: la ni gzhol bar 'gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ theg pa chung ngu bdud kyi las// sangs rgyas 'phrin las theg pa che// sdig pa thams cad spong ba ni// byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/
297a8: pa'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag grogs bsten ji lta bya// sdig pa'i grogs pa ci 'dra zhig/ log par lta ba mi gnas shing // de ltar yang dag song bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/
297b1: rnams kyis smras pa// gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa// rtag tu bde sprin grogs po'o// byang chub sems las gang zlog pa// de dag sdig pa'i grogs por shes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// lam du 'jug
297b2: par 'gyur pa yi/ / lta ba drang po ji lta bu// sbyor ba rnam par shes nas su// ji ltar lta de 'jig mi byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ las dang bya bar 'jug pa ni// de dag drang por lta ba
297b3: yin/ / log par sbyor ba rnam shes nas// lta ba de dag 'jig mi byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing // sems can yongs su smin par byed// ji lta bu'i thabs kyis ni// de dag
297b4: byang chub bsgrub par 'gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ brtson 'grus kyis ni chos bsrung ste// bsdu bas yongs su smin par byed// mtha' nyid rnam par spangs pas ni// byang chub
297b5: sgrub par byed pa yin/ / sel snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag shes pa'i las ci 'dra// nga rgyal las ni ji lta bu// ji ltar dka' blo bde ba dang // thams cad dus su 'thun par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'
297b6: gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ rtsod pa med pa'i shes pa'i las// nga rgyal las ni rtsod pa 'byung // dam pa bka' blo bde ba ste// gus pa yin ni 'thun par 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag lam ni ji
297b7: lta bu/ / log pa'i lam yang ci 'dra zhig/ bla med byang chub lam du ni// ji ltar sems can rab tu 'god// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// lam ni pha rol phyin pa drug/ theg pa chung ngu log
297b8: pa'i lam/ / shes rab thabs la bslabs pa ni// sems can lam la 'dud pa'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar bur na nor chen 'gyur// de dag rnyed pa'ang ci 'dra zhig/ gter rnams kyang ni ji lta bu// gang
298a1: gis de dag 'gro tshim byed/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ nor bdun dang ni rtag tu ldan// chos rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o// de dag gter ni gzungs yin te// rab tu rnyed nas tshim
298a2: par byed/ / sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag gi ni pha ma gang // nye du'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/ gang gis mkhas pa de dag mdzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams
298a3: kyis smras pa/ / ma ni shes rab phyi ni thabs// nye du byang chub phyogs rnams yin// dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te// des ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar bdag med rtogs
298a4: nas ni/ / byams pas 'gro ba khyab par byed// bdag med pa dang byams pa dag/ de la ji ltar mtshungs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// gang dag stong nyid rab shes pa// de ni
298a5: bdag med khong du chud/ / gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa// de ni de yi byams pa mchog/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'du byed rnams ni rang bzhin gyis// 'ong ba med cing 'gro med na// las dang las kyi
298a6: rnam par smin/ / ji lta bur na 'thod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// dam pa'i don du 'ong med de// gang du'ang 'gro ba yod ma yin// kun rdzob dun lam 'jug cing // rnam
298a7: par smin pa nye bar ston/ / sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang // smon lam rnam par spangs par ni// mtshan nyid gcig tu rab rtogs nas// de kho na ni ji ltar shes// byang chub sems
298a8: gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ stong nyid gang yin de mtshan med// mtshan mngon du gnyer med pa// mtshan nyid cig cing don gcig ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan to// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/
298b1: gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'o// stong ra rtog pa ji lta ba// sems can lta ba ji lta bu// yongs su smin byed ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ shes rab kyis na snang bar /
298b2: rtog/ thabs kyis sems can rnams la lha// snying rjes yongs su smin par byed// des ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// chos 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis// skye ba med cing
298b3: 'byung med par/ / tshul mchog 'di 'dra shes nas ni// gang gis 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// mi skye ba dang mi 'byung ba// de ni shes rab spyod
298b4: yul lo/ / bsams bzhin du ni gang skye ba// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ gtod la dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar bur na phyir mi ldog/ ji ltar bzod pa phun sum tshogs/
298b5: ji ltar rnam par nges par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis sbas pa/ mnyam par gnas par gtong la dga'// chos kyi dbyings las phyir mo ldog/ mi skyeb la bzod pa pa// chos shes nas ni
298b6: rnam par nges/ / sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ byang chub snying po snying po gang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshan nyid dag pa// ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar zol// byang chub sems dpa'i
298b7: gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ byang chub snying pa nam mkha' ste// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do// gang yang kun nas gti mug med// de bzhin nyid dpyir de bzhin gshegs// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bung dag zi pa
298b8: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas me skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob po/ / de dag gis bzod pa rab tu thob nas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ 'di skad ces kyang gsal te/
299a1: bcom ldan 'das gang ge srang du bdagacag gis nyan pa'i rna ba 'dis bu thob pas sangs rgyas ni bdag cagag ched du byung ba/ bcom ldan 'das sa la stan dang klu dbyangs 'di dag las the com 'dri ba'i sla'ad/
299a2: lta bu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa de dag thams cad kyi lan btababs 'khor 'di'i dgos pa thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag cag kyang chos snang ba dpag tu ma mchis bsdus pa de
299a3: mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das sil snyan de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis lan 'debs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
299a4: stsal pa/ bzhin bzangs dag de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs su blta'o// bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/ nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu byung na sil
299a5: stan las chos kyi sna ci phyir mi 'byung ste/ bzhin bzangs dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams/
299a6: cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig// bam po bzhi pa// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pa'i sgras mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mu tig Sha
299a7: dog sna tshogs kyi do shal thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasal mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i mu tig gi do shal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
299a8: par bkab bo/ / mu tig gi do shal de dag phul ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu gtsug gi drang thang gi steng gi bar snang la mu tig gi do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'gyur te/
299b1: khad pa rtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ ngos shin du rnam par bye ba sha stag go// khang pa rtsegs pa de dag na rin po ches spras pa'i khri rtsa ba yang rin po che las byas pa/
299b2: ras bcos ma'i zung du ma bkram pa dag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun du snang ngo //
299b3: de nas mi 'am ci'i mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/ tshem zhing mgu ste yid rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang
299b4: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de dag byang chub tu sems skyed nas 'ag zhig mchog du dga' ste dad pa thob nas/ thams cad kyi sgra skad dang / dbyangs gcig tu tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
299b5: mngon par bstod do/ / bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung ba// don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab// don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab bslabs pa// sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//
299b6: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug tha ba 'jig/ dgon par bzhugs dgyes bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa po// bcom ldan rgyal ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan sngar dri bral nyon mongs
299b7: me mnga' ba/ / sa'i dbang po pha rol dgra 'jom pa// pad mo lta bur srid gsum mi gos pa// bde gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nang na mig dang 'drar spyod cing // nyi zla 'di'i 'od ni spa bkod
299b8: pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su rgyal por skyes// 'khor lo mtshan lnga khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi chags shing // mgon dang dpung dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen byur// khyed dang
300a1: mtshungs med lhag pa ga la zhig/ mtha' yas dbyangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// brnyes dang ma rnyas nam yang chags mi mnga'// 'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs// chags sred
300a2: 'khri shing dra ba grol mdzad pa/ / bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// dul ba thugs ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab bzhugs shing // 'grol zang zing mi mnga' sbyin
300a3: stsol pa/ / sbyin pa'i gnas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// smra mchog dam pa mtshan gyi 'od 'phros pas// lam log phyin ci log ni rnam par spangs// 'jam zhing snum la snyen pa'i gsung gsung pa// srid pa gsum las
300a4: 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ / mi mchog gdung pas gdungs pa mi mnga' ba// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshegs// 'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'i gru mdzad pa// bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan
300a5: brtson 'grus dag la ston mdzad pa/ / chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes drug/ ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'grel// 'gro drug nye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gser gyi kha dog 'dral
300a6: phyag 'tshal lo/ / zhi gnas dbang po dul la phyag 'tshal lo// steng gi zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog yon tan mda' la phyag 'tshal lo// nyen mongs sregs shing brnyengs pa mi mda' ba// skye dgu 'di
300a7: dag bsgral dka' chu bzhin sgrol/ / bsgoms shing dbang po thul ba'i bcom ldan 'das// khyod la skyabs su mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal// thub pas sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab stsal// bslangs na dbang po dgyes par
300a8: rab 'gyur ba/ / pha rol dgal sbyin pa mchog stsol ba// gtong ba bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can da rgyal rgyags khengs gti mug pa// rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'gal bgyid rnams// 'phags pa bran
300b1: med pa'i lam mchog la/ / rnam par 'dren pa chen po khyod kyis bkod// phung po rang bzhin gyis ni stong mkhyen nas// las dang nyon mongs zil gyis mnan te bzhugs// 'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi som nyi gcod// bcom
300b2: ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bden pa'i chos la dgyes shing mnyam par gzhag/ chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog/ bcom ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal
300b3: le/ mchis pa mi mnga' g.yo smra rnams dang bral// bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa'i stobs po che// mi mchog lam dang la ma ma lags la mkhas// rlung dmar lta bur ci la'ang chags mi mnga'// gzir bar gyur
300b4: gsal pha rol shin du gnas/ / thub pa bsam 'tshal ba'i bad mdzod mda'// spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na gang gA'i yid// bye ma snyed kyi mi mchog rnams la mchod// mthu brnyes mi g.yo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// chags pa'i
300b5: skyor mi mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs/ / gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis brte no// de slad mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs// tshe rabs bye ba bsam mi khyab pa dgongs//
300b6: bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kis// 'jigs pa chen po'i dra ba rab tu 'dral// 'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud// phyag dang zhabs la bkra shis mtshan mnga' zhing // dkra shis bgyis las
300b7: 'jam pa'i ngan slong ba/ / bcom ldan bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs rnams la ni dbang gi pha rol phyin// zang zing mi mda' chos kyi sbyin pa stsol// thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab brdungs pa// chos rje bcom
300b8: ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / shAkya'i rigs rus rgyal po'i las byung ba// dbang po zhi zhing thugs kyang rab tu zhi// ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnam gzigs pa// bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
301a1: bdud rnams dpung dang bcas pas rno ba yi// ral gri bogs nas byang chub drung lhags kyang // khyod kyi bsdu tsam yang ma g.yos te// bcom ldan ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// mi'i dam pa bzod pa
301a2: pha rol phyin/ / sku rnams kun la nongs pa bgyis kyang bzod// yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'chibs pa// bzod gsung bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mthu brnyas bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo ba// gnas dang
301a3: gnas min mkhas pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/ / khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod// chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dus bgyis nyam chung snying po med par mkhyen// skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung
301a4: ba ma lags sel/ / khyod kyi mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad par 'phags// ye shes pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can long ba sdug bsngal mgon med pa// de dag khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum tshim
301a5: bgyis/ / khyod ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa// bcom ldan mgon zur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs dang bsam gtan dang ni dbang po sgoms// khyod kyis bdud ni dpung dang bcas pa bcom// srid pa
301a6: rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa/ / thab pa dbang po skams la phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa'i rtsa brgya chen chos bstan pa// mtshungs med byang chub lan chags mi mnga'// grib ma / khur mkhyen nas de bsungs pa// bcom ldan
301a7: gdugs 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'dren pa mi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud// 'phags pa'i 'khor la tshwa 'dra rab tu bskor// 'dus bgyis yang dag dran zi la ma 'drar// mkhyen nas sems can mang po dran
301a8: par mdzad/ / khyod kyi lpags mchog dag pa dri ma lnga// ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor lebs// ljags ni pad ma mdab ma brgyas phra/ lpags skyon mi mang 'khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// med gsum thun
301b1: sa pa ma ga/ brnams pa 'du // mags// 'ad gas rgya bas lags pa/ nga pa na gas pas pa sa da// na ma sa na sngag pa 'das mangs /
301b2: sa thal shi chags ma dul/ 'i dam lags myed pa skrag ga/ da tha sa pa shAgs/ nas pa sa rnam par rgyas su sa// na
301b3: thA/ / gnas dang ga'agacig ga don bamams pas// (/ pa tshwa bzhal rnam pa btags// glang pa na tha sa ma masbyin pa nga// 'di pa ma dang lda rnams grol dag// 2na kyi man tan mapa'am
301b4: rnyed / / mgon pa khyod la bdag ni thal mo sna / ma li mchog la rdul de b+har sbyin pas// maM mdad 'arnam bu'i rgyal por gyur la gas na// 'di ni dbang po dad pas thal snad nas// skabs su nye bar mam ba
301b5: 'tsha/ / pang po gsog ste nyams chung snying pa med// stong pa s+thA bar+tha b+hU 'dra bar ni// ko tam khyod kyis de dag yang dag pa da// phung po khams mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// smad pa'i sed byas dam dram du zer
301b6: te/ srid pa' 'gro bar dra bar rab grags pa// sid par 'gro ba rnams k+Shi dra ba ste// bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen pa'i 'odakyis dral// tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta ba'i gsung brjod pa// shaM bi ma lags mi 'gyur 'dri ma la sa/
301b7: bran tshags gsung de de dag thos nas ni// thal mo sbyar te sbubs sunye bar mchi// phyag gi mthil gyis sa 'dir reg pa na// nag sa tshal bcas par rnam pa drug g.yos kyang // 'dir ni gzhan la gnod par 'gyu
301b8: ma mchis/ / bdud phyogs dgra bcom khyod la phyaga'i'atshal lo// lha'i rgyal po chenang mkhas pa gang// khyod kyi chos don gnyer zhing mchis pa rnams// de dag so sor chos bstan thos nas su// zhabs gnyis lan
302a1: rab tu gdugs par bgyid/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
302a2: l dan 'das bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas bud med kyi dngos pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus
302a3: na/ ji ltar bdag cag bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos de/ bcom
302a4: ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bshad du gsol/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring mo dag de'i phyir
302a5: shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par
302a6: 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la
302a7: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sreng ma dag chos gcig dang ldan na brad med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos pa thob par 'gyur ro// chos gcig pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
302a8: sems skyed pa dang / ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems skyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjed pa med pa'i sems skyed pa ste/
302b1: sing mo dag/ chos gcig pa 'di dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes
302b2: pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ / gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dag med pa dang / ser sna med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos 'di gnyis dang ldan na bud med zad med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos pa
302b3: thob par 'gyur ro/ / sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa gsum yongs
302b4: su dag pa dang / ngag gi sdom pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i
302b5: dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ / sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par smin pa sbyin
302b6: pa dang / g.yo med par brlab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med par tshul khrims brten pa dang / g.yo med par chos nyan pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bung med kyi dngos po las
302b7: 8/ skyes pa'i dngos pa thob par 'gyur ro// seng mo dag gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bung med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos don
302b8: gnyer ba dang / chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / bsam pa thag pa nas bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa dang / rtag par rgyun du skyes pa'i lus 'thob par sems bskyed pa dang / ji skad smras pa de
303a1: bzhin du byed pa te/ srang mo dag rgyas sna bo 'dudag dang ldanan bud med bud med kyi dngos po las zla skyes pa'i dul po zab par 'gyur ro/ srang mo dag gzhanan yang chos drug dang ldanan du
303a2: med bung med kyi dngas pa las gyung te/ skyes pa dngas pa thob par 'gyur // drug gang na/ 'd-i/ nga ba dang / rten pa dang d+hA med pa dang / gal med pa dang gsal pa med pa dang / btsas pa med pa/
303a3: mo dag chos drug po 'di dag dang ldanan bud med bud med kyi dngas pa las gyur te/ skyes pa'i ngas pa tho par 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldanan bud med byad med kyi dngos po las gyur te/
303a4: skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro// bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par bya ba'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa dang / rang
303a5: gos phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mongs thams cad yongs su dor ba'i phyir gtong ba rjes sna
303a6: dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir// rjes su dran pa dang / de dag dgrol ba'i phyingar sems can thams cad la sems pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med zud med kyi
303a7: dngos po las gyur te/ / skyes pa'i ngas pa thob par 'gyur te// sring ma dag gzhan yad chos brgyad dang ldanan bud med bung me kyang ngas ba las b+h+yang te/ skyes pa'i dngas po thob par 'gyung ro// brgyad gang zhen/ 'di
303a8: ltaste/ zas la srid pa ma yin pa dang / rgom pa la sred po ma yin pa dang / me tog dang spos dang / phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma la sred pa pa yin pa dang / skye mas tshal du 'gro bar med pa mi yin pa dang / rgod pang
303b1: 'jo ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / glu dang gangar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la sred pa ma yin pa dang dga' ba dang rtse ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / rna ba dang sgra dang / sna dang dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus dang reg la dga' bal
303b2: sred pa ma yin pa ste/ sring mo dag chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos dgu dang ldan na bud med bud med
303b3: kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ / dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba ma yin pa dang / bdag tu sgrub ma yin pa dang / sems can du sgrub ma yin pa dang /
303b4: srog tu smrab ma yin pa dang / gang zag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin te/ sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang
303b5: ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur
303b6: ro/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems mi bskyed pa dang / skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed la bskyed pa dang srog gi phyir yang brdzun
303b7: gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang / pha rol po dga' zhing rtse ba la phrag dog med pa dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal mngon par ma sgrub pa dang / yang dag par
303b8: lta ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro// sring mo dge gzhan yang bud med zab
304a1: mol mos pa yin te/ de gzugs la lbu ba brdos pa lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyags shing mom par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba la chu'i chu bur so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tsher ba la rjes su chags pa med
304a2: pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor bas/ kun du gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur so sor rtog cing bud med kyi
304a3: 'du shes mi skyed/ skyes pa'i 'du shes mi skyed pa dang 'du byed rnams la chu shing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtog ste/ 'du byed thams cad la snying po med par rtogs nas 'du byed thams cad la mi gnas shing de la gnas pa mi
304a4: skyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/ sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa ste sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtogs nas chos thams cad la chags pa med/ zhe sdang med/ gti mug med pa dang / lus la 'byung ba/
304a5: chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams dang ldan pa dang / chu'i khams dang ldan pa dang / me'i khams dang ldan pa dang / rlung gi khams dang ldan par lus la so sor rtog go/ lus 'di ni bsdus pa rtswa dang /
304a6: shing dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ 'di bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skye gu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin gyi phyin ci log sngon du song bas rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyis byung ba'o// gzhan
304a7: yang bud med mig la kha zas las skyes pa/ sha'i gong bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la ngo bo nyid kyis stong
304a8: pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa'o// gzhan yang bud med lus la gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang / dag la brag cha lta bur 'jug pa dang / sems la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa'o//
304b1: sring mo dag chos 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos pa zab cing myur du zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par ngatshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de rnams
304b2: 'am ni'i rgyal po sdod pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das las bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chis zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs shing rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang song
304b3: bde ba stes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// dri med dri bral drim gcod mdzad pa// rdul med du ma tham sta/
304b4: pa'i gzi brjid mnga'// pad ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs// dri med zla zhal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mdzad zhid mdzad nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa// dga' ba ston pa rtag tu dgon par dgyes// rin
304b5: chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzod mnga' ba/ / yon tan mchog mda' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'jo mo// pad ma lta bur stong mchog bka' mchid gsung // lam mchog
304b6: stsol cing dam pa'i don ston pa/ / mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung // sa la rgyu ba 'di la mig stsol ba// 'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni stong mnga' ba//
304b7: rdul med pan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rdul bsal dam pa mthu bo che// mgon po 'gro la mchog gi don mdzad pa// bdud kyi dpung rnams stobs med 'jig mdzad pa// bcom ldan stobs
304b8: bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sred pa'i 'khri shing bcod mdzad mnyam pa med// brnyes pa dag dang ma brnyes mtshungs mnyam thugs// 'jig rten mthar 'byin snang ba'i sgron mdzad pa// rgya mtsho lta bu khyod la phyag
305a1: phyag 'tshal lo/ / dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mnga'// sbyin pa stsol cing rtag tu gteng la dgyes// dul bzhi gnas yon tan pha rol byin// nyon mongs rdul bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
305a2: mtshan mchog 'gro ba kun la dam pa stsol// skye bo'i 'dren pa lha'i mchog pas mchog/ byams dang stobs dang bzod la nges par dgyes// mchod 'os bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mar me lta bu dri med
305a3: zla ba 'dra/ / phyi nang nyon mongs dri ma gcod mdzad pa// nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nams gter// zhi ba thugs zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa stsol ba dge sbyong zhing mdzad pa// ston pa skye mched drug las
305a4: thar mdzad pa/ rjes su dran drug shin du yongs dag dran// rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog blta// gsung snyan dam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs// bcom ldan gang zag
305a5: dam pa skyes bu mchog/ srid gsum zhe mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs// rtag tu dka' thub brtul zhugs rab tu spyod// de bzhin kho na gzhan men de bzhin gsung //
305a6: mun par sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs grags ldan yon tan bas ma 'tshal// de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi gnas ston pa// yon tan brjod pa mthong zhing grags bsgrags pas// mchog tu dga' mdzad
305a7: khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bsngags la gnas shing brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags// khengs dang nga rgyal rgyags pa gcod mdzad pa// ye shes 'byung gnas rdul bral blo gros mchog/ skye bo mthar byin khyod
305a8: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / ka la bing ka tshangs dbyangs thugs rje can// 'dod pa brtsod bgyi dri ma sel mdzad pa// phung po yongs mkhyen mkhas pa bde bar gshegs// yon tan tshogs mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo//
305b1: yon tan ston pa yon tan bston mchod pa// zab mo blta dka' shin du rtogs par dka'// 'dzu ma zhal zla 'dra gsong por gsung mdzad pa// bdud stobs 'jom mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam thugs kha lo sbyar ba
305b2: rab dul thugs/ / kun gyis mngon bstod mnyam pa'i lam la gnas// thub pa mchog gsung bden pa'i bka' mchid can// bde gshegs mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lam stsol snyan pa shin du 'jam pa'i dbyangs
305b3: bdud kyi sde mang 'jom mdzad nga rgyal dang / / lhag pa'i nga rgyal mi mnga' tshul mi 'chos// thub pa dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dgyes// rtag tu 'dod chags skyon dang
305b4: rab rib bral/ / bde bar gshegs pa mig g.yo gnas la zhugs// stobs pacu mchog mda' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag dang zhabs ni dri med dra bas 'brel// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba mi mnga' ba// rgyal bas 'os pa 'gro ba kun las
305b5: rgyal/ / nam mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i sbas mi 'am rtse mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btugs pa dang / bcom ldan
305b6: 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
305b7: kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog sna tshogs byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'o// de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
305b8: yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par byas ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od mog mog bor byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/
306a1: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te zhes dang
306a2: bcas shing gus pa dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrubapa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ bde bar
306a3: gshegs pa ji skad 'dzum ston pa/ / zla ba dri ma med zhal khyed la zhu// dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la zhu// gser gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// dam pa'i gzugs rnams
306a4: mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ / 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad khyod la zhu// lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// sbyin dang dul la dgyes pa khyod la zhu// tshul khrims yongs
306a5: dag gyur ba khyod la zhu/ / bzod pa'i stobs dang stobs stsol khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu mnga' khyod la zhu// bsam gtan mngon shes dgyes pa khyod
306a6: la zhu/ / shes rab nam mkha' mnyam pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs can khyod la zhu// rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa khyod la zhu// dga' ba btang snyoms dgyes
306a7: pa khyod la zhu/ / bde bar gshegs pa ci skad 'dzum ston pa// srid pa gsum po mthar 'byin khyod la zhu// spyan gsum dri ma mi mda' khyod la zhu// bdud rtsi chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa
306a8: ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ / bdud rnams tha mar 'byin pa khyod la zhu// ngan pa'i tshogs rnams 'jom pa khyod la zhu// bden pa dam pa gzigs pa khyed la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// stobs bcu
306b1: dam pa mda' ba khyod la zhwa/ / the tsom dag ni gcod mdzad khyod la zhu// yon tan stong gis brgyan pa khyod la'u// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
306b2: kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i sgras rnams nga las dge ba'i rtsa bskyed do// bsam pa zag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur
306b3: zhing skyes pa'i dngos po thob par bya ba'i phyir nga'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi'am ci'i sras brgyad khri
306b4: b zhi stong po de dag gi bsam pa zag pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'dis 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur
306b5: ro/ / der skyes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin
306b6: gshegs pa byang chub thob pa na mnyes par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyang kun 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang rim gyis mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ de dag
306b7: gi dam pa'i chos kyang kun 'grob byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de dag rim gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun du rdzogs par byas nas gang gi tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal
306b8: po sdong po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ des dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
307a1: du lung ston par yang 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
307a2: mdzad do/ / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam bkum mo// bde 'gro thams cad kyi lam rnam par sbyangs so// bdag cag byang chub kyi lam la rab tu bkod do// bdag cag la chos kyi gter bstan to// bdag cag ye
307a3: shes kyi sa la bkod do/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar bgyis so// pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs bstan to// thabs la mkhas pa bstan to// bdag cag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du stsal to//
307a4: chos bsgrags pas rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// dga' ba dang dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob pas bzed bstod do// chos zab mo'i bzod pa la rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// bdag cag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu
307a5: bkod do/ / bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la byas pa bzo ba lags kyi byas pa mi bzo ba ma lags kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sha dang khrag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lan me lon na gzhan
307a6: gyis lan len par mi 'gyur ba blta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
307a7: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i ming ni ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur// longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa ni ji 'dra zhig tu 'gyur/ de'i
307a8: sems can bkod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni ji 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis yongs su
307b1: mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog tha dad pa kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma byung ste/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
307b2: snang bar byas te/ sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas nas lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dun par byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong du bskor ba/
307b3: byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i tsug du nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon chad ma mdzad pa'i 'dzum pa mthong nas stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das
307b4: kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
307b5: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs kyi 'dzum pa ci 'dra ba// de ring byung ste thugs med bye ba'i zhing // rgya chen phyogs bcu'i gang gA'i rdul mtha' yas// khyab pa de 'dri sngon chad yod ma
307b6: mthong / / tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang // nor bu me dang nyi ma zla ba'i 'od// mi dbang gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur// 'dzum mdzad 'di'i rgyu ni lung bstan gsol// su yi ched du dpa' bo khyod kyis 'od phyung bas//
307b7: 'dir ni ngan song gsum zhi byang chub yan lag rdzogs// chos kyi rje yis bdag cag rnams kyi dogs pa sol// mi rnams kyi ni yid gnyis ma lus legs par khum// 'khor kun dga' bas rtog bgyid na// su slad de ring
307b8: 'dzum pa bstan/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bskor ba byas te rang gi stan la 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
308a1: glang po che'i blta stangs kyis phyogs bcur gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po stong po 'dis tshul 'di lta bu dang / rgya che ba 'di lta
308a2: bu dang / rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
308a3: dga' bo mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ dkon mchog 'byung zhes bya ba'i bskal
308a4: bal 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med ces bya ba'i yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde ba gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
308a5: 'dul ba ba lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med pa de ni lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/ bai dUr+ya dkar
308a6: po las grub pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba/ shin du dri ma med pa/ shin du rnam par dag pa/ mching bu med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang tshad med par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dang
308a7: sems dpa' chen po de thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na longs spyod do// de dag
308a8: nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas pan bai dUr+ya dkar po las grub pa'i sa chen po der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de
308b1: dag gis mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thams cad na gzugs pab rnyan lta bu'o/ / zhes dran pa sgre bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sums dpa' gang chos gang la bcom zla band de bzhin gshegs pas del snang bar thung
308b2: sa wA ra 'gyud ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa da kyang byung nab skyem sa dpa di dag 'a grus bya na pagasamyas dang pa ga dra par 'gyur ro// byang rgya lam bdu da pa de pa
308b3: maM skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams den thong dang zong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i po zang 'khor yod par mi la ra
308b4: sems can de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bud med du gdags pa'ang med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad kyang bar
308b5: ma'i snying po las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na kha zas su gdags pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i zas can du 'gyur ro//
308b6: 'jig rten gyi khams de na gzhan rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la nges par 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de na tshul khrims log par zhugs pa 'am
308b7: sgrub log par zhugs pa 'am/ / chog log par zhugs pa 'am/ 'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni nan tan dang ldan pa ste/ sangs rgyas
308b8: kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba sha stag go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'am/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon
309a1: par zhen pa dang / pha rol grol ba med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni zab mo'i spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ming du btags pa
309a2: tsam dang / 'du shes tsam ma gtogs par wA dang mi zhes tha dad du bya ba med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs su spyad pa ma mtshungs par 'thud do// kun dga' babacom ldan 'das yon
309a3: tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yang lha dang / mi rnams kyis skye ba mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang pol bde ba'i phyir bar gyi bskal pa bcu tham par/
309a4: bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'gru
309a5: 'bar ba 'dinga'i 'og tu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
309a6: rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyor ba blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes
309a7: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba lung bstan nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo bar gyi bskal pa de yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang chos dkon mchog dang dge 'dun dkon
309a8: mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bar gyi bskal pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas dga' zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs
309b1: shing rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi bar snang las shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i
309b2: 'khor dad pa rgya cher spel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben
309b3: pa dang / dri ma med de nam mkha' nga ba nyid// rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na// de phyir de dag thub sras thu bor 'gyur// rmi la ma bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med// thams cad med de bzung med gsog dang gsob// chos
309b4: rnams thams cad zil ma 'drar shes nas/ / 'dus byas dag la skyo bar 'gyur ba med// la las sgyu ma'i te dang glang chen dang // shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon mthong ba// dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar// phung po 'ang
309b5: dag sgra 'dra snying po med/ / gzugs kyi rang bzhin lbu ba rdos pa bzhin// tshor ba 'di ni chu'i chu bAr 'dra// 'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gsungs// 'dus byas thams cad chu shing snying po med// srid gsum 'di na sems
309b6: yid rim par shes/ / rgyal bas de bzhin sgyu 'dra gsog tu gsungs// gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par riganas ni// 'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med// khams bzhi pon chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang // skye mched
309b7: rnams da grang snang / / bu dang // chos 'di gseg dang gsob ltar rnas shes pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin// rab tu dus phyir sbyin dang dril ba dang // de bzhin nul khrims rnam dag rgyal khrims dang //
309b8: tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad// stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag/ bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang // de ltar shes rab chags med ma spros par// gang gi 'jug pa de 'drar gyur
310a1: bde/ / pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab tu phyin// bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam// nam mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag/ zhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yi// lam 'di tshangs pa'i
310a2: lam ste rtag tu zhi/ / bsdu ba bzhi po khyad par 'phags pa 'di// rnam par 'dren pas rjes su gzung phyir gsungs// 'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa// de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin// sems can 'di dag
310a3: bdag med sems can med/ / srog dang gso ba gang zag mi rnyed do// dbang po drug 'di stong ste ra bzhi par// gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin// sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med// de ni gang du'ang
310a4: bdag med rlom sems med/ / gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa// sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal ldan// chos 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra// gang du'ang mi 'ong nam yang 'gror mi 'gyur// chos
310a5: dbyings 'di'i gnas pa rig nas ni/ / rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas// gang na'ang yod pa 'am med pa med mod kyi// rgyu la brten nas chos rnams 'byung bas na// mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni// /
310a6: sems kyi khri shing de ltar shes par bya// rlung ni nam mkhar mi chags rgyu ba bzhin// gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas// nyon mongs gzugs med sogs par
310a7: mi 'gyur ro/ / lus ni rtsig pa rtsa dang lo mo'ang // blun pa rje med rdo shong ngan pa ltar// de yis sna ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas// lus kyis chos la gnas par mi byed do// tshig ni rtag tu gzung med drung dang 'ang / 'i
310a8: brag gi brag cha lta bu ste/ / de 'drar sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa// sgra rnams kun la 'dod pa'i chags pa med// bdag ni nam mkha'i ngos nas mi ltung ste// mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin/
310b1: chos 'di nam mkha' 'dra bar bsgoms nas ni// de ltar sems can sems can med mtshungs gnas// bskal pa brgya phrag mang por gasregs kyang ni// ji ltar nam mkha' nam yang sngon ma tshig/ chos rnams thams cad
310b2: nam mkhar 'drar shes pa/ / de sreg bskal tshe zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro// ri dang ri rab khor khor yug ri// de bzhin ri dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun// nam mkha'i ngos kyis bye bar riganas de// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba'i
310b3: shing du 'gro/ / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang // khams bzhi 'di dag nam mkha'i ngos mnyam par// dpa' bo tshul 'di khong du chud pa dag/ mkha' las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro// srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi bag/
310b4: bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ci yod pa// de'i mtha' ma bskal pa brgyar brjod kyang // sngon gyi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med// rang byung ba ni mtshan mchog ma yin yang // sems kyi chos kyis gzugs kyis rab tu phye// sems
310b5: dang yid ni mtshungs pa dben par 'gyur/ / rgyal ba thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam// sngon gyi sred par byang chub spyad spyod cing // dge ba brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni// byang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes
310b6: pa/ / grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstan 'gyur// chos rnams kun ni rang yul yongs dag ste// mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yum du mnyam// mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes pa// yon tan ldan pa de dag lung
310b7: bsan 'gyur/ / bdag ni gzugs men tshor min 'du shes min sems dpa' ma yin rnam par shes med kyang // byang chub khong du chud pas bdag lung bstan// phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan// bzod pa gang zhig bco/
310b8: mnas zhi yi// skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dra min la// mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod pa na// mi dbang 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan te// chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam// bdag ni bdag med stong pa'i rang
311a1: bzhin te/ / stong pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang bzhin no// zad par bya phyir zad par shes mi nus/ mi zad pa ni zad pas zad mi 'gyur/ zad pa'i sgo yis chos rnams kun ma skyes//
311a2: bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ston to// mtshan med gnas 'jug pa yi gnas med de// yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las grol// ma byas byed dum bcug byung ba min// de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung
311a3: bstan/ / gal te bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na// chos lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ba yin// sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor ma yin// chos sbyor khyad par 'phags 'di mtshungs shing mnyam// khyed cag thams cad
311a4: sa'i steng na 'khod/ / bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas// sa dang nam mkha' mnyam par shes nas ni// srid pa gsum na chags med ye shes 'jug/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos tshigs su bcad
311a5: ba 'di dag smras nas/ / steng gi bar snang las babs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag
311a6: gi ched du byung ngo / / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par ma bgyis te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma bslus pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
311a7: gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / de nas 'khor de'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ mi 'am
311a8: ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed snyam mo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
311b1: lha'i cod pan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs
311b2: bgang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches zangs med pa/
311b3: rgyas pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
311b4: pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin
311b5: chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems
311b6: dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug bcur gyur te/ thams cad kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// de
311b7: tshe'i tshad ni la bye ba zag drug bcu thub par gyur to/ / dge ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang bai dUr+ya las grub pa/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ dga' ldan
311b8: gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang / longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba bsams brtsam gyis 'byor pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma togs par theg pa gzhan rnam par
312a1: gzhag pa med par gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhag byung ste/ de'i sras
312a2: stong phrag bzhi bcu yod do/ / de'i bu ni stong tham pa yod do/ dpa' ba brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs can pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag// rigs kyi bu rgyal brisa'i dzin des brtsam
312a3: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug bcu la lo bye ba tham par yid du 'ong ba'i chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang sa
312a4: byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas te//
312a5: dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bston nas bud med bzhi stong po de dag dang / bu stong po de dag dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// des byang
312a6: chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang lo bya bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen bkur byas so/ / de dus gzhan zhig na bu thu bo brtul zhugs yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug
312a7: nas rgyal srid thams cad bor te/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de na rgyal po'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis bu
312a8: thu bo re re rgyal por bcug nas pa'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na rnam grangs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ring bar gyur to// rgyal po gzhon nu de dag thams cad de bzhin
312b1: gshegs pa de las rab tu byung nas rgyal bu gzhon nu tha chungs snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig tu ma gtogs te/ de ni chos kyis rgyal srid byed pa chad pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun par dbang
312b2: byed du bcug go/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal pos 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de'i dam
312b3: pa'i chos rab tu bzung du/ / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhil dbang ba'i 'khar los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhin zhig yin pa snyam du khyad dgas shing thatsam tha'am/ yang
312b4: gnyis su gyur pa lta na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to// rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni da
312b5: ltar phyogs bcun byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
312b6: ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed tshun chad/ da'i bar thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang chos nyan pa dang dge 'dun la rim gro byed par
312b7: mthal bar gu to 'odas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa tshogs kyang myur du yang dag par sgrubs pas/ 'di la ngas 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
312b8: sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung yang bstan to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcon ldan
313a1: ' das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'ang ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyes pa'i rgyub
313a2: nas yun ring du lags pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgrib pa mi ming mi mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji ska smras pa de bzhin
313a3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems
313a4: kyi rgyu zang pa/ / 'gags pa/ thal ba/ rnam par gyur pa/ rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang / rgyu gang dag med pas zad pa/ dge ba'am mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa'am/ lung du ma bstan pa de dag
313a5: thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud zung ba dge ba'am/ mi dge
313a6: ba'am lung du bstan pa'am/ lung du sa bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems rang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pa
313a7: rab tu shes so/ / gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'am lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems
313a8: gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi da bcas pa/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
313b1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang
313b2: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zhag bdun bde bar snang
313b3: bathams da kyis bsnyen pakur byas nas yongs su longs spong par bya ba'i slar re dge 'ang khyim dang / 'khor gyi khyams de yang bcom ldan 'das la phul tote 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
313b4: mthugs brtse ba'i slad du rtag tu 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol/ / de nas skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs pal po che'i don dang /
313b5: 'amache'i dang / dri za dang / 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'ab ci'i rgyal po sdang po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig ces thabs bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phrul nas bcom ldan
