313b6: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs su lags kyang bdag cag ni sil snyan dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /
313b7: klung dgar la rab tu chags// me tog dang spros dang bdug pa dang thug padud/ rgya ma la bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na/ ji ltar bdag nag pag ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
313b8: yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgo'i gdams dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la stsal bar gsol/ / de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'amachi'i rgya
314a1: po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bzhin bzangs de'i phyir deng phyin chad sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos drug bcu rtsa bzhi byung bar
314a2: ljid la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / drug bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang / dben pa'i sgra dang
314a3: mi skye ba'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can med pa'i sgra dang / srog med
314a4: pa'i sgra dang / gang zag med pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / byams pa'i sgra dang / snying rje'i sgra dang /
314a5: dga' ba'i sgra dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / 'ong ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang / rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /
314a6: smon pa med pa'i sgra dpa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / rten pa'i sgra dang / rten pa med pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra
314a7: dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / yang dag par spong ba'i sgra dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra dang / dbang po'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dang / lam gyi sgra dang / zhi gnas kyi sgra dang / lhag mthong
314a8: gi sgra dang / thabs kyi sgra dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / bdud tshar gcad pa'i sgra dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi
314b1: lam dang / gzugs pa da dang / chu'i zla ba dang / blan Na/ bu'i m+b+ha dang / chos kyang byengs 'dres pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'khor bas yongs sum ba'i s+thA dang / 'byung ba'i sgra dang / dge bu'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi da/
314b2: srub dang / chu'i rgyu byar dang / sdig rgyu dang / chu shing gi phung po dang / snu mra dang / snying po med pa'i sgra dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos bsgrub pa'i sgra 'thung bar 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs dag de na po
314b3: rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las gang gi khyed bag yod par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
314b4: bam po lnga pa skye tham// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
314b5: 'dus rnams kyi byang chub 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis shin du byin brlabs pa dang / chos bstan pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin du yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar /
314b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ thogs po dag dzi skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin du yongs su bzung // tso'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chubs sa
314b7: yongs su bzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi don nyid do//
314b8: de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi ched du de dag go cha gang gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du gzung bar 'gyur ba'i go tshe chen po gyon no// grogs po dag rnam grangs
315a1: 'dis 'di ltar nga da ltar bathugs kyang dang yangs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byung chubasams dpa' rnams yongs su bzung ba ma da pa gang yin paras sems can thams cad yangs su
315a2: bzung ba yin par rig par bya'o/ / grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i bsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis rim gror byas pa ni sems can thams
315a3: cad la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar banye bar bsgrubs pa ni sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar banye bar rabasgrubs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
315a4: grogs po dag tha na byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la
315a5: phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to/ / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang
315a6: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te// de
315a7: nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di snyam du bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bdag gi gnas nas/ bya rgod phung po'i ril gshegs
315a8: p a ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
315b1: par bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/ shing rta de yang bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs nas/ de ltar na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas mi 'am
315b2: ci'i rgyal po sdong pos yid las byung ba lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'bang du dpag tshad lnga byon du pag tshad lnga pa kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/ shing sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che
315b3: drab bras pa/ rin po che'i skud pa mig mangs ris su bres pa mngon par sprul nas shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkrab blta na sdug pa/ 'phang du mi bdun yod pa/ ras bcos mazung brgya
315b4: stong mang po bkram pa mngon par sprul/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor mngon par sprul/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan zhing zham 'bring du
315b5: 'brang ba brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan yang shing rta de'i steng du ci rigs par sprul to//
315b6: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa de sprul nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slang
315b7: du shing rta 'di la ji ltar gdan gshams pa rnams la/ 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs su gsol// de nas seng ge'i khri de la bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' dang /
315b8: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 'khor thams cad kyang ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shing rta de lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ shing rta la bdun srid kyi stong gi
316a1: bar snang la lkugs nas/ de nas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad dang bu brgyad stong po de dag dang gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang dri za dang lto 'phye chen po brgya stong phrag du ma dang mi 'am
316a2: ci'i rgyal po sdong po nyid kyang rin po che'i thag pa thogs nas shing rta la btags te/ nam mkha' las drangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i dkyil nas
316a3: gshegs pa la mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs blangs nas mchod pa byed de/ mdun du dong zhing bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// mi
316a4: 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po/ / gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag/ sel snyan rnams kyi rab tu bkrol bgyid cing // yang dag bsngags pas 'dren la bstod pa bgyid// mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid
316a5: gyur/ / gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs// bden pa'i yon tan la ni rtag gnas pa// yon tan 'tsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra// g.yas g.yon na
316a6: yang rnam par mthong ma myong / / ji ltar ri rab brtan zhing mi g.yo ba// de ltar khyod kyi sku ni dpal gyis mdzes// 'dren pa khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi// nam
316a7: mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mi mda'/ / bcom ldan nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang // brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lha// nyi ma zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i 'od// khyod
316a8: kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur/ / shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan// sems can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas// 'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// 'jig
316b1: rten grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdud bzhi po yi skyon rnams bsal ba po// bden pa bzhi la bsgom zhing dpyod mdzad pa// rdzu 'phrul bzhi'i stobs kyis bskyengs mi mnga'// sangs rgyas gshegs
316b2: pas gshegs te gshegs pa mdzes/ / bskal pa brgyar yang skye ba me mnga' zhing // rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par gzhag/ legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang // khyod ni tshig dang skad
316b3: la gnas ma lags/ / khyod kyi gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu mnyan// zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par mchi// sgra ni sems can gang gis thos gyur pa// de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur// sems
316b4: can kha lo sgyur ba spu gcig tu/ / stong gsum rgya mtsho'i chab rnams zhugs gyur kyang // sems can rag pa rnams la'ang mi gnod la// rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yongs mi gda'// stong gsum gyi ner bor
316b5: rab dag/ phyig gcig gi ni mthil du gzhag nas su// zhing ma bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad kyang // khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum ma mchis// khyod ni bskal pa brgya phrag bsam yas nas// brtul zhugs dka'
316b6: thub tshul khrims yon tan dang / / sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin du bslabs// sangs rgyas bye ba mngal bsnyen bkur mdzad// de dag rnams kyis bshad
316b7: pa'i chos kyang bzung / / thugs rje ljon zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'// rim gror ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing // rim gro bgyis pas mtho bar 'gyur ma lags//
316b8: dogs lta bur snyoms shing mi g.yo ste// 'jig rten chos gnas mi gos pad ma bzhin// chos rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang // chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang // lbu brdos 'dra rmi lam glog 'dra dang //
317a1: sAg d+hA'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen// de bo nyid kyis gang zag pa dag ma mchis// gdod nas stong zhing mig yo rnga ma mchis// nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis// dngos po bas par dngos po ma
317a2: mchis 'dra/ / las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams las// byung ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par// tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pas na// de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bgyi// gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos
317a3: gyur pa/ / de dag la ni dran song 'jigs ma mchis// de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te// srog chags de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags// bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod// kun du mchod pas mchod pa bgyis
317a4: nas su/ / byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te// gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog/ nam mkha' la ni dpag tu nus kyang gda' // rgya mche'i cha ba ni bas bgyir nus kyang gda'// nyi zla mkha' las sar
317a5: ni lhung mda' yi/ / sangs rgyas yon tan bas par 'gyur mi mnga'// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs shing / gser gyi kha dog lta bur sku
317a6: las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang / 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri yang rab tu khyab par gyur to// /
317a7: de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der gshegs so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang //
317a8: grong rdal ba dang / khyim bdag tu bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang /
317b1: byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das gal
317b2: bder dong / / sdo pe'i sras rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed do// mi 'am ci ma'i rol mo sil spyan gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad du grag par gyur to// de ltar mi
317b3: ma ci'i rgyal po sdong po dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer te bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing
317b4: ta de las babs nas rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang shing rta las babs nas bcom
317b5: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te rang rang gi stan las 'khod do// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang /
317b6: gnas gcad pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rta de las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra thon pa dang / rgyal bu dang /
317b7: tshod dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / grod rdal ba dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang
317b8: chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
318a1: la sum gnyel tam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol
318a2: to/ / bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te/ shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i
318a3: rgyal po sdong po'i 'khor dang bcas pas ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po slas dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas
318a4: pas 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
318a5: rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur lung bstan pa
318a6: thob par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi 'am ci'i bdag po sdong po la 'di skad
318a7: ces smras so/ / mi 'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyis khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shes shig kho bos kyang thob par
318a8: 'dod do/ / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang sems can thams cad la dbul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'
318b1: rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de gang yang med do/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni ser sna can ma yin te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi bskyed de/
318b2: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de yang
318b3: sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang / sems can la sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi phyir 'brang
318b4: bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rnyed de/ de gnyis las khyod kyis dam pa'i chos thos nas des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /
318b5: gti mug gi ling rtog chen pos 'tshams med pa'i 'gyod pa byung ba'i sems bsal nas khyod kyis chos la chos kyi snang ba chen po thob ste/ chos kyi snang ba des khyod da ltar sgrib pa med pa thob cing gnas pas khyod kyis kyang
318b6: rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ / rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par byas te/ ji nas kyang chos kyis tshig dang / yi ge 'bru gcig thos pa yang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang
318b7: rlung zabar mi 'gyur ba dang / kun du bzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
318b8: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces
319a1: bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na chos kyi snod du 'gyur ro// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
319a2: dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i snod sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mang du thos pa'i
319a3: snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros dang / don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang / longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
319a4: sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang / sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang / dogs pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes
319a5: rab dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang / dbul zhing nyam thag pa thams cad bskyab pa'i snod snying rje dang // chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spang ba'i
319a6: snod btang snyoms dang / / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i snod thos pa chog pas ngoms mi myong ba dang // mi bltos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang / don nyung
319a7: zhing bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang / / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang // sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu ba'i dngos po dang // chos sdang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs
319a8: su 'dzin pa dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang // sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i snod spobs pa dang // sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
319b1: snod chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba'i snod zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i snod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i snod rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / mi 'khrug
319b2: shing byed par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod byer mi ldog pa'i sa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
319b3: chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldanan chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems
319b4: can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du bur cig/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad
319b5: ces bka' stsal to/ / mi'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyis 'khor 'di skyo bar 'gyur du 'ong gis khyod rang gi gnas su song shig/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdongs pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyob de byang chub sems dpa'
319b6: zhes mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni skyo ba bzod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyob lags/ ji ltar na yongs su mi skyo ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
319b7: kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med pa
319b8: thos na skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po
320a1: 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ / mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa de
320a2: yang bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las zla bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o// zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa
320a3: de bdag gis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pa bsags pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub ste/ bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o// zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i
320a4: bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ / mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
320a5: lta ste skabs skabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa la re ba dang / skabs skabs su rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal bar 'dor zhing yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang yang dag par
320a6: rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su spo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
320a7: chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ / zhi gang zhe na// 'di lta ste rab tu nyen kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi re ba dang / lus dang srog kyang 'dor zhing dam pa'i
320a8: chos bsrang ba dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am
320b1: ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slong ba mthong na yongs su skyo ba dang / bsod nams byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang
320b2: mang du thos pa tshol pa la mi brtson pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la mi ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag
320b3: po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slong ba la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed cing zhe sdang ba'i sems med la bzhin 'dzum zhing //
320b4: khro gnyer med de tshul shog legs par 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'i tshig smra ba dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms shing / ji ltar thos pa'i chos
320b5: rnams kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston cing zad zing med pa'i sems kyi chos de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par
320b6: bya'o/ / mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la
320b7: mi sbyor ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / yon tan chung ngu tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing gong du mi tshol ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
320b8: ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ / mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol
321a1: thun pa la ma yongs samal ba dang / sru 'dadus po la rtag tu btsun pa dang sems can yangs su ldan pa byed par bcan 'grus byam pa dang / da thazas cad yangs su bgang pa byad dam mchags
321a2: ba yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi pa sgrub par 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la lan btab
321a3: nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi pa grub pa la 'jug pa 'di thos sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/
321a4: bcom ldan 'das thos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su mi skyo bar spyad par bya'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
321a5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskar ba'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am
321a6: bdag po ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su bskar ba'i phyir khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal
321a7: po sdong pos rang gis pi bar de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so/ / pi bang de blangs ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis pi bang gi sgra de las sang
321a8: ge bsgyings pa ltar shing sa la du ma g.yo ba'i slar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / / pan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang / chos thos nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyor
321b1: pa gang spyod pa/ / de dag yongs su skyo ba med par spyod/ bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyad pa dang // sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa med// /
321b2: btan pa spyod dang bden pa spyod pa dang // bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang sgyu med spyod pa yis// dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa dang // dngos po thams cad yongs
321b3: su gtong spyod dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ser sna med par spyod pa yin// tshul khrims spyod pa ma nyams spyod pa dang / lus dang ngag ni yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa//
321b4: dag ngan pa'i ngang tshul spyod pa med// brtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang // khro skyon yongs su spyod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gnod sems med par spyod pa yin// brtson 'grus
321b5: spyod dang mthu rnams spyod pa dang / / 'khor bar yongs su mi skyo spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spyod pa dang // lus dang sems
321b6: ni rab tu dben spyod dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag g.yeng ba med par spyod pa yin// shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spyod pa dang // chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gaspyod pa
321b7: gang spyod pa/ / de dag shes rab 'chal ba'i spyod pa med// byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag khro ba'i thab med par spyod// stong pa spyod dang
321b8: rab tu dben spyod dang / / mtshan ma med pa yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon pa med par spyod pa yin// yang dag spyod dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang // thams cad mkhyen pa yongs
322a1: su dag spyod dang byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ / de dag gang du' chags pa med par spyod// dad pa spyod dang dad pa spyod pa dang // dran dang g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de
322a2: dag yongs su gcod pa med par spyod/ / bsam gtan spyod dang rnam par spyod pa dang // mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyad pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag chags pa med par spyod pa yin// sangs rgyas spyod dang dang
322a3: chos spyod pa dang / / dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dkon mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin// chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang // sems can thams cad yongs su smin spyod
322a4: dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa yin// bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang // mtha' kun yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang lta bar
322a5: spyod pa med/ / dag pa spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang // nyon mongs thams cad yongs su spyod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su gdung bar spyod pa med// bde ba spyod dang shin tu rngam thar spyod// sems
322a6: catsan kun la 'jigs med mchog spyod dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dge smon la spyod pa med pa yin// nyi ma spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang // pad ma lta tha dgos pa med spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag
322a7: lhar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba/ / brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang // dkar po'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gdung rnams sder bcas skrag par byed// mchog spyod
322a8: pa dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang / / 'dod chags nyes pa thab gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa med// lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang // shes rab mig ni yongs su
322b1: dag spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su rtog par spyod pa med// dul ba spyod dang rab tu zhi spyod dang // ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag lha dang mi ni ming pos
322b2: bstod/ / 'phags pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang // g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod spyad dang // byang chub mchog gi spyad pa gang spyod pa// de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa yin// dpa' bo spyod dang shin du brtan spyod pa// bdud kyi rdza
322b3: rnams 'jig par byed spyod dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag byang chub snying por gzhal ba yin// gzung ba spyod dang don yod spyod pa dang // gzungs la g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
322b4: spyod pa/ / de dag gang du'ang ma rig spyod pa med// dgon pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod pa// rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin// tso ba'i spyod
322b5: dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang / / 'jig rten thams cad zil gnon spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag drung ngul ni spyod pa med// rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang // bsam gtan pad las ldog pa
322b6: spyod pa dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag med shes spyod pa med pa yin// lta ba spyod dang rnam par lta spyod dang // ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag 'jigs
322b7: pamed par spyod pa yin/ / thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang // dbang po yongs su smin par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag la shis nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
322b8: bstan pa'i tshogs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di pi bang gi sgra de las byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'khor dang // rgyal po'i khab kyi bram
323a1: ze dang / khyim bdag dang // mi 'am ci dang dri za dang // lto 'phye chen po de dag gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag/
323a2: cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la slab par bgyi'o// nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yang dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o zhes
323a3: smras so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'gror gnang do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bu dang bcas// dpung dang bcas/ slas dang bcas/ rang gi skye bo
323a4: dad bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bar byas te/ bzod pa gsol nas sil snyan dkrol// me tog gi char pa ba// 'od
323a5: zer gyi dra ba byung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/ de skad cig thad cig yud tsam de nyid la ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan du rang gi khyim du phyin to// de nas bcom ldan
323a6: 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pas/ bdag zil gyis non to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
323a7: bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos khyed 'ba' shig zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyi/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thob pa ma gtogs par gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
323a8: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zil gyis non to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems
323a9: bskyed ma thag pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa thams cad zil gyis non to// kau shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
323b1: zil gyis mi non to/ / gang byang chub sems dpa' la zil gyis gnon par sems pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa
323b2: 'byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thal mo sbyar te mtsho ma grags nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o bdag ni
323b3: sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing / sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las nyams so zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu lha'i bu 'od zer bsrung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
323b4: byur te/ 'dug pa des lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ltar gangang du len pa rnam par bsgrub par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par
323b5: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la snying rje red pa ma lags/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen la bsten pa ma lags te/ phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba'o// yab skyon med/
323b6: pa la zhugs te rgud tshig cing sa bon tshig ste/ theg pa chen po'i sdod du ma gyur pa la da bgyir ci mchis// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu las lha'i bu stong tha ma pas bla na med pa yang dag par/
323b7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'od zer bsrung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba smod pa brgya
323b8: stong phrag ji snyed pa bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ btor ba ni bdag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa ni de bzhin
324a1: g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cung zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis
324a2: bshad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa gang dag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs pas chos de 'thob par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
324a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od zer bsrung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od zer bsrung byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems
324a4: dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'od zer bsrung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
324a5: sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang chos mnyam pa nyid dang dge 'dun mnyam pa nyid dang zhing mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i
324a6: bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhis stong pa nyid la rnam par rtse ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug gis
324a7: thabs mkhas pa la rnam par rtse ba dang / mngon par shes pa lngas ye shes la rnam par rtse ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'od zer bsrung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa
324a8: 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'od zer bsrung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang
324b1: zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po rnams la byang chub tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la byang chub tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / skye
324b2: mchod rnams la byang chub tshol yang skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la byang chub tshol yang chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/ 'od zer bsrung byang chu
324b3: sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'od zer bsrung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur
324b4: robazhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang / chos
324b5: thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar shes pa dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste/ / 'od zer bsrung byang chub sems dpa' chos
324b6: bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga stor mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par
324b7: 'gyur to/ / lha'i bu 'od zer bsrung ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis
324b8: mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba bstan pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag
325a1: gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zab mo rnam par nges pa dang don bzang po dang tshig 'bru bzang pos brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan
325a2: 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgom bsdus pa de gang yang ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de yang de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas 'bum
325a3: mur du skyes so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa blo chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyon ma mchis pa/ tha chad la zhugs par gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di lta
325a4: bu'i chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa/ blo rgya che zhing rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa chos rin po che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa/ gsol
325a5: pam btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das
325a6: kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog por 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin
325a7: gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od ji snyed thur ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang stong phrag brgya'i cha dang bye ba'i cha dang bye ba khrag khrig brgya zag stong gi cha dang grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba
325a8: dang dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba gang yin pa shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na de bzhin
325b1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang
325b2: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag ldang bar 'gyur ro/ / kun dag 'o gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag
325b3: l a yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba don du gnyer ba dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa
325b4: dang byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang bdud dang phyir rgol ba btsam pa dang byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
325b5: to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod
325b6: nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po ches
325b7: bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang byir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin
325b8: pa dang / de bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang bye ma da kyi dus dang srong dang nam gyi gung thun dang / tho rangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs
325b9: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa byin pa dang rnam grangs 'di lta bus lo cig gam/ lo rgya'ang lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na kun dga' bo la ji snyam du
326a1: sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ste tshad ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis
326a2: so/ / bcom ldan 'das gdugs gcig bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de yang tshad ma mchis na gung lo brgya phrag stong du bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
326a3: khyod mos par bya'o/ / khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub don du gnyer ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang sems can rab tu thar bar bya ba don du gnyer ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos sam/
326a4: 'dzin tam/ 'chang dam klog gam kun chub par byed na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed na gang de bzhin du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
326a5: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam 'dzin tam// 'chang ngam// klog gam kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang ston na de ni sbyin pa zhes bya
326a6: ste de ni sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o/ / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa rnams kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rjes su 'dzin pa de ni rjes su bzung ba rnams kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi gding
326a7: ba de ni gding ba rnams kyi mchog go/ / 'di lta ste/ chos yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// zang
326a8: zing gi sbyin pa byin pas ni lus bstan pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba chos kyi sbyin pa de sbyin par bya ste/ chos kyi
326b1: sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni yon tan gyi phan yon yang dag phul sum bcu rtsa gnyis rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di
326b2: lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon
326b3: mongs pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang po la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis brjod par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / las byas nas bsod
326b4: snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang / chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa nam
326b5: gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba dang dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ba
326b6: dang ngan song thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing de la lha dang mir skye ba dka' bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang chos nyan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa
326b7: dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang skye ba dran par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / nam du yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ba dang /
326b8: gzi brjid can gzungs kyi sa bon bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mkhas pas g.yog byas par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / mAr du
326b9: chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnan nas de chos kyi gter zad mi shes pa yongs
327a1: su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste/ kun dag po byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin na yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag phul sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po
327a2: brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du bsgrag par bgyi/
327a3: mos par bgyi kun bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa don du gnyer ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
327a4: byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ kau shi ka khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de'i mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so// kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nga'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid du gnas pa de srid du lha
327a5: dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur lha rnams ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yang dag phul yin te/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni
327a6: 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa'o/ / kau shi ka gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba la dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung ngo // kau shi ka gang mi dmigs pa de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// de nas
327a7: bcom ldan 'das la me mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas pa tshad ma mchis pa gtang ste/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang
327a8: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de dang de dag tu bdag chos nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o/ / mchis nas kyang chos smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang bskyab par bgyi'o//
327b1: de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen
327b2: bo bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po de dag dang bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs de sha ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang srab
327b3: dang sgrub pa la brtson par bgyi'o/ / dag cag gi 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag kyang ji nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du brtson par 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
327b4: 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la brtson pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa bsrung ba ma mchis pa de dag bsrung ba'i ched du gsar
327b5: sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kha ton du bgyi'o/ / gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum la sogs pa dang mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas/
327b6: gyi bstan pa la zhe sdang bar bgyid pa rnams shin du tshar chod par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ ta ra pe/ a ra pe/ a no pe/ sa ra be/ hu lu/ pa hA/ bu lu/ hu lu hra lu/ A bad Te/ bi kad Te/ ba ri tshAd ni/ ni gra nin+yA ti/ prag+hA ta ni/ id Ti/ mid rdzi
327b7: bidi Ti bid Ti/ ang tshe/ gang tshe pA ra ni gra han/ sarba ba ra pra bA di ni/ gra ha na/ sarba mid byA bra yA tA nan ni gra han/ tA nan ni gra ha na/ sarba bud d+ha ba ra Ni tA d+hA ra ma Ni ya ta sha ya/ b+hU tan/ bud d+ha ba ra ni ten/ tsa tur ma hA rA dza na de shan/
327b8: man tra ba lan/ a ba tA ra/ a bat+tA ra/ dwe k+SheHna pra hA ya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang byang chub sems dpa' lha'i bu cod panal bka' stsal pa/ byes bu dam pa dag ngas bskal pa #
327b9: las grangs med par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di ji nas yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir khyed gnyis kyi lag tu gzhag go gtad to// de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
328a1: cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bgyi'o/ / rgyas par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsnun pa'i ram
328a2: kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ / de dag mdo sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag gi yid rab tu bzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na
328a3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyis
328a4: brlabase lags par rig par bgyi'o/ / de nas bdud sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de gdong las mchi ma zag cing nga ro phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan
328a5: 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te/ chos bstan pa de la ni bdag tha na spu zing zhes bgyid pa tsam yang ma mchis so// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs
328a6: kyis byin gyis ba sa pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa sems can thams cad kyi ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa de bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing bdag nyid rnyis par gyur pa snyam
328a7: bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la phyag brkyang ba stsal du gsol// gang thos pas bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu yang mi gsung bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
328a8: pa/ sdig can khyod dang 'thun pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di lta bu la ma mos pa ni mang/ gang dag mos pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gis/ mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig/ sdig can 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i steng
328b1: nas rdul blangs pa snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so/ / sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lam mos te/ de dag thams cad ni khyod dang 'thun no// sems
328b2: can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang 'thun gyis de bas na sdig can dga' bar gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med pa ni byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' dgu
328b3: khri nyis stod ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ / sro gachags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong brgyad stong ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa
328b4: rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas sdang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// lha'i me tog gi char ni rab tu bab/ sil snyan brgya stong dag nim
328b5: dkrol bar rang 'grol lo/ / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni steng gi bar sdang la kye ma bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi nam
328b6: 'di bstan te bshad nas/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni grong khyer khor mor 'jig tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa de bas ches chog go// gang chos kyi rnam
328b7: grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang / than glegs pas la bris te/ 'chad pa'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// nas
328b8: ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ / de das bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
329a1: grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi budag 'di'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
329a2: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
329a3: stsal pa dang / byang chubs pas dpa 'byams pa dang / tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / wa dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal yi ma
329a4: te mngon par dga'o/ / 'phags pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho//
329a5: zhwa chen gyi lo tsa ba ban rje dpal gyi lhun po dang / dpal bstegs kyis bsgyur cing zhusate/ gtan la bab pa/
329a6: oMd+ha.A he tra pra b+ha ba hrI/ shAg ta bya ba da// teSh+Tha rgya la na ngoHoM ts+li pathapa/ ma b+ha la/ thAm /
